A total of 30% of the seats will be made available to attendance area applicants.IEP and EL students: Preference is given to students with combined NWEA MAP scores that equal 48 or above.Note: Repeating 8th graders and students pushed into 8th grade from 6th grade due to age requirements qualify for selection but will be placed in a lower preference group.

Students who live within the school's attendance boundary can be admitted automatically.Students who live outside of the school's attendance boundary are randomly selected by computerized lottery. The lottery is conducted in the following order: students attending Boone, Field, Gale, Hayt, Jordan, Kilmer, McCutcheon, McPherson, or West Ridge Elementary Schools; sibling; general.
Students are selected on a point system. Points are based on 7th grade final GPA and NWEA MAP scores. The school determines the minimum cutoff score for selections.
